name: Vivre avec Ataxie
description:
This multimédia exhibit addresses the fundamental intersection between Desire and Disability.
Magdalena Guzman, a 27 years-old Montreal-based actress, living with cerebellar ataxia,
started this documentary series in collaboration with Annie Maheux.
Annie is a visual and art performance artist also based in Montreal.
These two women put forward here a clear statement:
Magdalena wants to live a full life, to love and to be loved.
Here 4 short videos portraying Magdalena's life and singular personality,
though her quest for a fulfilling sex life.
